text: Batman Begins is a 2005 stealth/action-adventure video game based on the 2005 movie Batman Begins. It has all of the cast returning except Gary Oldman. It was also going to be released for the PlayStation Portable but got cancelled. ==Plot== The game starts out with Batman at the Narrows before going through a tutorial set during the movie's start. === Voice cast === *Christian Bale as Bruce Wayne/Batman *Michael Caine as Alfred Pennyworth *Liam Neeson as Henri Ducard/Ra's al Ghul *Katie Holmes as Rachel Dawes *Gavin Hammon as Sergeant James Gordon *Cillian Murphy as Dr. Jonathan Crane/The Scarecrow *Tom Wilkinson as Carmine Falcone *Morgan Freeman as Lucius Fox *Tim Booth as Victor Zsasz *Mark Boone Junior as Detective Arnold Flass *Fred Tatasciore as Ra's al Ghul (impersonator) *Emma Thomas as Dr. Emma Thomas (an Arkham Asylum psychologist) *Wall Pfister as Wally Pfister (a mobster working for Carmine Falcone) ==References== Category:2005 video games Category:Batman video games Category:The Dark Knight Trilogy Category:Electronic Arts video games Category:Vicarious Visions games Category:Action-adventure games Category:Detective video games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Single- player video games Category:Stealth video games Category:Superhero video games Category:Video games about terrorism Category:Video games based on movies Category:Video games set in psychiatric hospitals Category:Xbox games
title: Batman Begins (video game)
